channel.title: Help! deltascape questions!
channel.description:
hey i have a server that is deltascape based here are i few questions i need answered:
1.How to change the home teleport from fally to edge? 2.How do you change the items which you start with? 3.how do you add objects like the godwars and make it tele you to a specific location? 4.how do you change so that when everyone starts every quest is complete? 5.How do you change how many waves u have in Fight caves? 6.how do you make an object that when u click it, it changes your mage book? LAST 7.How do you make it so that everyone has infinite run energy?
please answer!

item.title: Help! deltascape questions!
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

That’s called spoon-feeding, not learning.

Read full topic

mod foxen no offence but u dont no anything
i have learned more than half of making my server by asking

item.title: Help! deltascape questions!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Mister G. Look around on forums and try to learn as much Java stuff as possible. Asking People for stuff wont get you no where.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! deltascape questions!
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote="~gunz~, post:3, topic:249972"][quote author=`Rich link=topic=329561.msg2576054#msg2576054 date=1228956327]
The teleports can be changed in the clickingMost class.
The starting items can be edited in the initialize method.
Adding the objects is in the NewObjects method, and making it teleport is in the first click object packet.
Set the quest integers to 15 by default.
Edit the methods he uses for them, not exactly sure which, as I’m not familiar with the base.
Edit the first click object packet, and use the setSideBarInterface method.
Remove the energy reducing in the player class.
[/quote]

rich can you give me a 508 complier please[/quote]

Javac.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! deltascape questions!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

The teleports can be changed in the clickingMost class.
The starting items can be edited in the initialize method.
Adding the objects is in the NewObjects method, and making it teleport is in the first click object packet.
Set the quest integers to 15 by default.
Edit the methods he uses for them, not exactly sure which, as I’m not familiar with the base.
Edit the first click object packet, and use the setSideBarInterface method.
Remove the energy reducing in the player class.

Read full topic
